name: Build and block
description:
This game is a game by Mustafa Abbasi made in 15 hours across 5 days. You have to build boxes and other things to progress through the levels. The game is complete but will receive updates

Changelog 3-10-21

A Troumendous amount of bug fixes

Added one very easy level

Updated "Info"

More info in the "info" section of the game. Thank you for playing!
